column5: I'll be camping next week, and will probably fish a different local lake every day. Thinking of trying Bass Lake. Is there any free launches other than the PP one? If not, is the entry fee the same as Sibbald PP? $12???  Oh and whats in there besides largies?
Big catfish and if you can find the deep whole out in the middle,rainbows. As for the launch no idea. I know they do charge though,and the ramp must be ok as bass boats launch there aswell. Have fun.
hey john......i think josh has fished that lake a few times...maybe you wanna give him a pm......(bassfighter)   good luck  peter
$12 DOLLARS?!?! Wowee Do they launch your boat for you and clean your fish upon returning lol
Thanks guys! Big catfish as in Channel Cats or brown bullheads??? Rainbows too? I wonder what lure they can be caught off in the deep water???  Thanks Peter. I'll give Joshua a call.
Nah. But it includes enterance to the provincial park and access to the beach and park facilities.  But Launches used to be $5 and as soon as I got my boat? Some launches are $20 now!!! Pathetic!
geez I'd be happy with $12. I've been to lots that are 15 or 20. Good luck with the camping/fishing jb. Let me know if you can get out this thursday
Sorry johnny. Bull heads. But they are big and hang out where them big buckets hang out.
Thanks Brian. Rizzo, you have a PM. Maybe we can get together when I am camping up there since I will be fishing alone and would enjoy some company.  Brian? You taken any days off next week???
Do you mean.is my cold going away anytime soon? I maybe able to hang on to it for a day or two.LOL PM sent or being sent.LOL
